DOC.criteria: Age 1840 year . RBC folate > 317 nmol/L < 906 nmol/L . At least 1 menstruation last 3 month screen exception woman use progestinonly method ( injection , implant ) progestinreleasing intrauterine system ( IUS ) . Negative pregnancy test screen admission study . Healthy confirm medical history physical examination . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.530.0 kg/m2 . Volunteers smoke less 10 cigarette per day include age 30 year . Adequate vitamin B12 status define plasma B12 concentration ≥ 110 pmol/L . Regular intake folic acid define > 100 μg folic acid/day vitamin supplement fortify food last 4 month . Treatment follow medication , potential interfering folate metabolism : cholestyramine , methotrexate , trimethoprim , sulfasalazine , salicylic acid , cotrimoxazol , antacid antiepileptic drug .
